Hello and Welcome! My self Magaram, a student and researcher in political studies, currently affiliated with the Centre for Political Studies at Jawaharlal Nehru University, New Delhi.
With a strong academic and field research background. My current policy research interest lies in the "Exploring the challenges and movements of farmers, and the dynamics of agrarian societies and policy research in India".
